snippet: The weekly newsmagazine has suffered much of the same difficulties, as other print media as people moved to online news.
abstract: Newsweek is bought by International Business Times for undisclosed amount, three years after billionaire investor Sidney Harman purchased weekly magazine from The Washington Post and merged it with The Daily Beast.
lead_paragraph: The weekly newsmagazine has suffered much of the same difficulties, as other print media as people moved to online news.

headline.main: Newsweek, Sold in 2010, Is Changing Hands Again
headline.print_headline: Newsweek, Sold in 2010, Is Changing Hands Again
